short_summary: supply of medium coarse kiln-dried wood shavings
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (rcmp) requires the supply of medium coarse kiln-dried wood shavings (softwood) on an ",as and when requested" basis. The destinations are pakenham breeding farm and ottawa stable. The intend is to establish a one year contract with three (3) optional one-year periods. Up to two contracts may be awarded in result of this solicitation. The selection is based on the lowest responsive bid per destination.",
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada PSPC
